text: Pamidimukkala (also known as Veerankilaku) is a village in Krishna district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is located in Pamidimukkala mandal of Nuzvid revenue division. == Education == The primary and secondary school education is imparted by government and private schools, under the School Education Department of the state. The medium of instruction followed by different schools are English, Telugu. Schools Zilla Parishad High School Jesus High School. Mandal Parishad Primary School Sai Sri Upper Primary School == Nearby Mandals == Vuyyuru Mandal Pamarru Mandal Thotlavalluru Mandal Movva Mandal == See also == List of villages in Krishna district == References == Category:Villages in Krishna district Category:Mandal headquarters in Krishna district Category:Villages in Andhra Pradesh Capital Region
title: Pamidimukkala
